pkgmetadata.longdescription: Linear Models for Prediction and Classification using Proximal Operators // Implements optimization techniques for Lasso regression, R.Tibshirani(1996)doi:10.1111/j.2517-6161.1996.tb02080.x using Fast Iterative Shrinkage-Thresholding Algorithm (FISTA) and Iterative Shrinkage-Thresholding Algorithm (ISTA) based on proximal operators, A.Beck(2009)doi:10.1137/080716542. The package is useful for high-dimensional regression problems and includes cross-validation procedures to select optimal penalty parameters.
